titles.title: Conveyance Capacity Correction Act
To provide for restoration of the original carrying capacity of water conveyance facilities impacted by land subsidence, and for other purposes.

bill.summary:
Conveyance Capacity Correction Act
This bill allows the Bureau of Reclamation to provide funding to repair certain water conveyance facilities that (1) need nonrecurring repairs because of damage caused by land subsidence; (2) have lost a specified portion of their designed carrying capacity; or (3) would, with restored carrying capacity, assist in meeting groundwater sustainability goals.
